1.heading: Dynamic, imaginative and innovative design
1.text: We work in all sectors of the events market and therefore have detailed knowledge of progressive trends and design styles. Numerous in-house theatre trained designers greatly widen the idea base.

2.heading: Excellence at any budget
2.text: We are experienced in working to any level of the budget and always actively source high level services while respecting our overall client spend.

3.heading: Full office support and infrastructure
3.text: All our designers project manage their own designs, providing continuity throughout the production process. Competent office staff provide the single point of contact throughout the project.

4.heading: Brand awareness
4.text: We are very conscious of the importance of our clients' brand and the need to enhance yet adhere to it.

5.heading: Drive and professionalism
5.text: All Spirit staff have years of professional training, extensive and varied experience in live events, and are committed to delivering our clients' vision. We understand the value of co-operation with other event teams to ensure smooth integration of different disciplines during the design stage and on site.

6.heading: Most advanced equipment at the best possible cost
6.text: We don't need to push our own stock equipment onto the project as we have established a trusted global network of equipment and manpower suppliers. Using suppliers local to the event significantly reduces logistical costs and is better for the environment.
